label: DocumentIntelligenceLayoutSkill
description: A skill that extracts content and layout information, via Azure AI Services, from files within the enrichment pipeline.

fields.label: Chunking Properties
fields.tooltip: Controls the cardinality for chunking the content.

fields.label: Extraction Options
fields.tooltip: Controls the cardinality of the content extracted from the document by the skill.

fields.label: Markdown Header Depth
fields.tooltip: The depth of headers in the markdown output. Default is h6.

fields.label: Output Format
fields.tooltip: Controls the output format. Default is 'markdown'.

fields.label: Output Mode
fields.tooltip: Controls the cardinality of the output produced by the skill. Default is 'oneToMany'.
